mapper.select: SELECT us.use_number, us.qb_number, us.tb_number, us.use_date, us.user_email, tp.user_email as tutor_email FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_usehand_student WHERE user_email = #{user_email}) us, tbl_question_board qb, tbl_tutor_page tp WHERE us.qb_number = qb.qb_number AND qb.tp_number = tp.tp_number ORDER BY us.use_number desc OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} rows FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
